channel.title: Ernest Bloch: The man and his music
channel.description:
For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: See previous entry. Also: Musical content of this series spans Bloch's life. This prog.: Andante for String Quartet (1895), Macbeth: Two Interludes; Schelomo, Hebraic Rhapsody for Cello and Orchestra,Documentary/music series about the life and work of the late Swiss composer Ernest Bloch, featuring his daughter, Suzanne, of The Julliard School of Music. With her commentary are readings by actors, including Robert Morris. More info next entry.,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Trois Poemes juifs; Suite No. 1 for Unaccompanied Violin; Concerto Grosso No. 2 for String Orchestra and String Quartet,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: String Quartet No. 1 in B minor,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: America, An Epic Rhapsody in Three Parts,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Suite Modale for Flute and Strings; Abodah for Violin; Israel Symphony,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: String Quartet No. 4; Concerto Grosso No. 1 for Strings with Piano Obbligato,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Five Sketches in Sepia; Scherzo Fantasque for Piano and Orchestra; String Quartet No. 5,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Four episodes for Piano, Winds, and Strings; Proclamation for Trumpet and Orchestra; Voice in the Wilderness,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Poems of the Sea; Concerto Symphonique for Piano and Orchestra,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Three Nocturnes for Piano, Violin, and Cello; Fantasie for Violin and Piano; Violin Concerto,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Sacred Service (final section performed under the direction of the composer),For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Piano Sonata (1935); String Quartet No. 3,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Baal Shem, Three Pictures of Chassidic Life; Piano Quintet,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Enfantines; Suite for Viola and Piano,For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: Violin Sonata No. 1; Poeme Mystique for Violin and Piano (Violin Sonata No. 2)

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).
